CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK(CAA_Step__c), '', IF( Is_CAA_Final_Result__c , IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Approval_Result__c)), IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(NST_Pricing_Shadow__r.Approval_Assigned__c)),ISBLANK(NST_Pricing_Shadow__r.Approval_Result__c)), 'Waiting Approval', IF( NOT(ISBLANK(NST_Pricing_Shadow__r.Approval_Result__c)), IF( AND( BEGINS(Approval_Result__c,'Approve') , BEGINS(NST_Pricing_Shadow__r.Approval_Result__c,'Approve') ), 'Approved','Rejected' ), IF(
BEGINS(Approval_Result__c,'Approve') ,
'Approved','Rejected' ) ) ), 'Waiting Approval' ), 'Waiting Approval' ) )
CustomField.label: CAA Final Result
